thread.title: ADOPTABLE PET: MARY S. ROBERTS PET ADOPTION CENTER
thread.title_full: ADOPTABLE PET: MARY S. ROBERTS PET ADOPTION CENTER - Press Enterprise

author: The Press-Enterprise
title: ADOPTABLE PET: MARY S. ROBERTS PET ADOPTION CENTER
text:
Published: Oct. 16, 2015 2:36 p.m. ADOPTABLE PET: MARY S. ROBERTS PET ADOPTION CENTER Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT Blanca is available for adoption. COURTESY OF MARY S. ROBERTS PET ADOPTION CENTER Related article » Animal’s name: Blanca
Breed: Terrier mix
Color: Tan
Age: 5 years old
About the animal: Most of the time, Blanca prefers the quiet side of life, cuddling and taking long walks. She doesn’t mind other friendly dogs and she’s curious about cats. Her transition to someone’s home would be easy.
Agency: Mary S. Roberts Pet Adoption Center, a private, non-profit, adoption-guarantee organization
Location: 6165 Industrial Avenue, Riverside
Hours: Noon to 7 p.m., Monday through Sunday; closed Tuesdays. Vaccination clinics are 9:30 a..m. to noon every Saturday.
Information: 951688-4340 or petsadoption.org
Contact the writer: community@pe.com
